mapper.select: SELECT cm.seller_id,cm.buyer_id,cm.item_code,cd.writer_nickname, cd.chat_date FROM chat_mst cm LEFT OUTER JOIN user_mst um ON (um.id=cm.buyer_id or um.id=cm.seller_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN product_mst pm ON(pm.item_code=cm.item_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN chat_dtl cd ON(cd.item_code=cm.item_code AND cd.buyer_id=cm.buyer_id and cd.seller_id=cm.seller_id) WHERE um.user_nickname=#{user_nickname} AND cd.chat_content IS NOT NULL ORDER BY chat_date asc

select * from chat_dtl cd left outer join chat_mst cm on(cm.buyer_id = cd.buyer_id aND cm.item_code= cd.item_code AND cm.seller_id=cd.seller_id) where cd.buyer_id = #{buyer_id} and cd.seller_id=#{seller_id} and cd.item_code= #{item_code}
